scripts.start: yarn workspace types build && concurrently -k "BROWSER=none yarn start_web" "yarn start_electron"
scripts.startPeer1: concurrently -k "BROWSER=none yarn workspace web startPeer1" "yarn workspace electron startPeer1"
scripts.startPeer2: concurrently -k "BROWSER=none yarn workspace web startPeer2" "yarn workspace electron startPeer2"
scripts.start_electron: wait-on tcp:3000 && yarn workspace electron start
scripts.test: yarn workspace web test && yarn workspace electron test
